Master Answer:
ImmunizeBC cannot confirm that information for this location. In general, the majority of health units throughout BC are open Monday to Friday. Depending on the time of year or if a disease outbreak occurs, there may be adjustments to hours or days of services.
On the Island Health website, it does not specify the days for this location: https://www.islandhealth.ca/our-locations/health-unit-locations/esquimal....
Immunization Nurse
Master Question: The Health Unit pages show the hours, but not the days. Are all offices M-F only, or are any open on weekends? e.g. https://immunizebc.ca/public-health-unit/esquimalt-health-unit
Master Question variation 0: are health centres open on weekends
Master Question variation 2: are all office hours and hours the same day
